participant_1.background:
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.
I am thinking that I need to get some help for my addiction to meat.
i am not a big fan of waiting in line.
i drive a ford mustang.
My favorites things are the ones that I share with my mom.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to adapt to change.
I have other interests that I am putting my time and energy into.
I grew up in the Midwest, but now I live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains.
i love coffee with cream.
i live alone with my dog.

content.text: Hi, I am looking forward to chatting with you.
Hello, I am looking forward to chatting with you too.
I grew up in the Midwest but now live in a small town in the mountains.
Oh fun, what do you like about living in the mountains?
I love the outdoors and the fresh air. I love hiking, camping and skiing.
That sounds amazing. I love the outdoors too, but I live in a big city.
I can understand that. I used to live in a big city and it was fun, but I needed a change.
I am glad you made the change. It sounds like you are really happy now.
What kind of work do you do?
I am a software engineer, and I work remotely from home.
That sounds like a great job. I am a teacher, and I love my job too.
I am glad you love your job. I think it is important to find something you love doing.
I agree. That is why I love teaching. I love working with children and helping them learn.
That is amazing. I am sure you are a great teacher.
Thank you. I try my best.
